proyectNebula.name: Nebula Wear
proyectNebula.description: Luxury apparel brand and e-commerce platform focused on creating a robust and scalable solution. I lead the technical team, guiding the development and applying our specialized skills in each area. My focus is to take this project to its full potential.

proyectAgiliza.name: Agiliza
proyectAgiliza.description: A startup dedicated to the centralization and presentation of business data. I led the creation of the app, developing the interface that displays BI charts and managing authentication, user control and permissions.

proyectMoorishville.name: Moorishville
proyectMoorishville.description: Is a county in the United States for which I have worked as a freelancer. My most notable project for them was the development of a system for searching files in a local database.
